name: Journey Master
description: Journey Master is a travel companion web app where users can add, manage, and delete tourist spots to create personalized travel experiences.
features: Users can add, manage, and delete tourist spots
Interactive UI for curating personalized travel experiences

name: Fantasy Home
description: Fantasy Home allows users to explore luxury property listings, enhanced with search functionality and immersive features like maps and virtual tours.
features: Browse luxury property listings with search functionality
Interactive maps and virtual tours for immersive experiences

name: Spellbound Library
description: Spellbound Library is a curated digital library platform with genre filters and an intuitive book management system for readers.
features: Curated book collection with genre filters
